item.title: yIGF.TW Second Online Meetup
item.description: The meetup is scheduled for August 8, 2024, at 17:00 (Taipei time). Detailed meeting information is as follows: https://u-tokyo-ac-jp.zoom.us/j/87923755622?pwd=DneQtc0AM2ZODMClAykbY9UkWwNN2b.1 ID: 879 2375 562 Passcode: 022751 If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at organizers@yigf.tw. Everyone is welcome to join!
